message: Welcome to my store! I'm excited to offer you a unique product for $100. With 20 products sold so far, 6 of them have been high-quality. I'm confident that this product has a good chance of being high-quality too. Would you like to take a chance and buy it?

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm making an educated guess based on the statistics. I'm aware that the probability of the product being high-quality is 33.33%, and I'm willing to take that risk. I'm hoping it will be a high-quality product, but I understand if it's not.

This new product is from the same batch, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to get a high-quality product?
